A Greener Choice for the Environment

Ink Australasia Pty Ltd has an ongoing commitment to the environment. We are constantly looking at ways to reducing our carbon footprint. Pixel CMS™ is a 100% Green Powered system hosted on a Digital Pacific ECO Server. Please visit Digital Pacific’s website to find out more information on green hosting.
